title: AI Translator Bot Sample
shortDescription: This sample bot demonstrates the text translation using an Azure OpenAI service.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the AI Translator Bot that is an advanced skill bot that uses Azure OpenAI service to translate user-provided text inputs. It offers seamless and accurate translation, delivering responses in the desired language to facilitate smooth communication.
